TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_Ca-se-din-ni_yise, title = Ca-se-din-ni_yise, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ca-se-din-ni_yise} }

S.FORM: == Ca-se-din-ni yise查士丁尼一世 == Ca-se-din-ni yise u Ku-lio-ma zitay hedek nu sakaetiman a mikuwanay nu tademaw, nikuwanan nida mahida u Luo-ma-ti-kuo likisi namaka sumamaday pasayda i teban nu sumamad nu secian a sakaetiman nu malakuuytay. lawpesen nida ku Ya-den syeyen atu mikuwanay namaka Luo-ma kunhekuo zitay laya a kawaw. micunus ci nida tu hunti sakala nipabelian a kawaw, mahiniaya a waywayan tada palul'cus tu Luo-ma-ti-kuo u hungti malasaybakan, " malawama nu kanatal" atu " sayaway nu tademawan" a syakay nu waywayan. . likisi a syecia ci Pu-luo-ke-pi-e-se saan ci Ca-se-ten-ni yise a kawaw nida yadah ku kamu ci nidaan. Pu-luo-ke-pi-e-se a nicudadan katukuh ayda saan ci Ca-se-ten-ni yisean nipikuwanan u saetimay a cudadan. . kaudipan生平 Ca-se-ten-ni nganganan nida ci Fuo-la-wi-yu-se.Pi-de.Sa-pa-ti-yu-se, alen nu sinawama ci Ca-se-tin yise malapadek sa sumad hank u nganganan ci Ca-se-tin-ni. pilecuhan hakiya i sepat a lasubu walu a bataan idaw ku tusa mihcaan itida i Se-lea-se-sin-sen-se-kaw-pi-ye nu malaukay a niyadu'an, malukay ku luma'. ci nida u Se-lea-se tademaw " caay kaw Se-la-hu tademaw, dayhan Sa-pa-ti-yu-se u Se-lea-se a nganganan". tada kamu nida u La-tin-yi, hakiya uyni ku sakanamuhan nida a Ti-kuo nutipanay a kawaw. ci Ca-se-tin-ni naw Ca-se-tin yise a iluc, Ca-se-tin u hitay ci nida, kapah ku kawaw nida sisa patapabaw han malatahudan, alaw malahungti. . Ca-se-tin yise sapadekan nida ci Ca-se-tin malawawa kapah ku nipahabay malamilaylayay a tademaw, imahin ci Ca-li-se itini i ti-kuo cen-ce u tahudan tu ci nida. kapatayan ni Ca-se-tin yise, patideng han ci nida malaHun-ti, pacupiyaway ku acawa nida, bangcalay a Di-aw-duo-la, nai' ku wawa tatusa. . limnemlim mihca caycay bulad caysip demiad Ca-se-tin-ni itida i Cun-se-tan-tin-paw mapatay. 565年11月14 . sakay hekal a kawaw外政 Ca-se-tin yise nganganan nida a kawaw sakay hekal sapiduduc tu Luo-ma a nipatideng tu kilisetu nu sikuan a kanatal. likisi syecia misuayaw tina kainian ninakawawan idaw ku wenday. idaw ku sananay ci Ca-se-tin yisean tu tenes a nikiyakuan tina kawawan, nika idaw ku sananay tina kawawan u lima a lasubu tulu a bataan idaw ku sepat mihcaan u tahudan nu hitay nida ci Pei-li-sa-liw mademec ku Wan-ta tademaw sisa malakawaw nida sa. Ca-se-tin yise sadikuday nida u La-ti-yi ku kamu nida a Tun-luo-ma hungti, pabaluhay midebung tu Ku-luo-ma kanatal a ahebalay nu lala'an. Pu-luo-ke-se-e'-se itida i likisi a cudadan nida tu " malepacaw" idaw ku nipikilukan tu ci Ca-se-tin yise a nikalepacawan. . nidaduyan a nakamuan評價 nikaydaan a likisi ni kinkiwan ci Ca-se-tin yise a nipikuwan nu zitayan mahida u Si-la-luo-ma zitay nikudanay a kapahay nu zitayan, ayda a nikinkiwan tuyni a kawawan idaw ku mahicaay kiya a kamuan. misuayaw tu nipatideng nida tu kanatalan katukuh ayda idaw henay ku cinglaw. ci Ca-se-tin yise hatidaay tu nu tenes a malpacaw yadah ku malawpesay nu Tung-luo-ma kanatal, tadayadah ku nikalawpesay nu Tung-luo-ma a kalisiwan. amica ku nikahida, hedek sa mikuwa tu Tung-luo-ma kanatal nai' ku nipabaliwan u Ti-cun-hay lilis a icelangan, nika uyni a nikaicelangan nu kawawan tada talakawtu ku nipacubelis. amica ci Ca-se-tin yise a sakay hekal a kawawan, sakay labu nu kawawan kacilicili han. micidek ku tawyaay a tademaw ni Ca-se-tin yise pihacen ku nipicilian ci nidaan. micidek ci Pu-luo-ke-pi-e-se itida i "mi-se" misuayaw ci Ca-se-tin yise patahekal tu picidekan a nipicilian. aydaay a lise-syecia tu sakacinlawan nu kitidaan ci Ca-se-tin yise a cen-ce' atu ayawan nida a tademaw ci Ca-se-tin yise nu kawawan tatengan idaw ku tabakiay nu laadan, atu Ca-se-tin-ni yise a kawaw tatengan haw sakalihalay a nisimsiman u linzi a nipatucekan. . kasilahecian 總結 katukuh tu ayda ci Ca-se-tin-ni yise pala u sumamaday mautangay nu cacay a min-cun. nai' ku sapabaliw ci nidaan atu Tay-ke'-li since atu Cun-se-tan-tin ta-di' sakalecad u Ku-luo-ma tikuo mautangay nu sakaetiman a hung-tian. malamilaliday tu batad, pikuwanan nu matenesay a Hung-ti amisuayaw tu sapikawaw tu pulung nu kawawan caay kaw madayunmay. sipakayda i yadhay a musakamu ci Ca-se-tin-ni yise itida i O-cuo likisian nu sipakayda pasayda i cungseci a milakuuday, situngusay nu angangan a tademaw. . Ca-se-tin-ni yise malangatu mikawaw henay tu kanatal a picidekan nu angangan u Luo-ma henay a waywayan, kapatayan ni Ca-se-tin-ni-yise malaSi-la tu ku wayway. palawpesen nida ku Ku-luo-ma a kuo-min cucun, Hung-ti mala cun-cin nipabeli nu di'tu a kanatal cu-cun. nika tawya u Hung-ti mangalay henay tu hitay a nipacukel atu duyi. itida i Fa-sye atu Sen-sye ci Ca-se-tin-ni yese a sapaayaw nu nikudanay a sapalahat idaw ku picidekan a malalid. sakay hekal nida a sapalekal tu kanatal a kawaw patideng itida caay kaw tanektekay, ci Ca-se-tin-ni yise caay kaw matenesay a mapatay mahicaay tu kiya ku niyadu'. walian nu lilisan ci Ca-se-tin-ni yise yu maudip henay kanatal namangalay tu sakauip malingatu tu miedis. . ci Ca-se-tin-ni yise malingatu patideng tu kanatal a kiyaku u sadikuday a mapalekal hanipisepi han ku Luo-ma kanatala, nika caay kaw kapahay a tahudan, pikuwanan nida ba'ket ku dadimata'an nu tademaw, itida i kiwkiwkayan caay pisudang, amica ku nika hida nida ka caay pisudan caay tu kalaheci ku sapitunyi tu kanatal a mukti.

== Ca-se-din-ni yise查士丁尼一世 == Ca-se-din-ni yise o Ko-lio-ma zitay hedek no sakaetiman a mikowanay no tademaw, nikowanan nida mahida o Loo-ma-ti-koo likisi namaka somamaday pasayda i teban no somamad no secian a sakaetiman no malakooytay. lawpesen nida ko Ya-den syeyen ato mikowanay namaka Loo-ma konhekoo zitay laya a kawaw. miconos ci nida to honti sakala nipabelian a kawaw, mahiniaya a waywayan tada palol'cos to Loo-ma-ti-koo o hongti malasaybakan, " malawama no kanatal" ato " sayaway no tademawan" a syakay no waywayan. . likisi a syecia ci Po-loo-ke-pi-e-se saan ci Ca-se-ten-ni yise a kawaw nida yadah ko kamo ci nidaan. Po-loo-ke-pi-e-se a nicodadan katokoh ayda saan ci Ca-se-ten-ni yisean nipikowanan o saetimay a codadan. . kaodipan生平 Ca-se-ten-ni nganganan nida ci Foo-la-wi-yo-se.Pi-de.Sa-pa-ti-yo-se, alen no sinawama ci Ca-se-tin yise malapadek sa somad hank o nganganan ci Ca-se-tin-ni. pilecohan hakiya i sepat a lasobo walo a bataan idaw ko tosa mihcaan itida i Se-lea-se-sin-sen-se-kaw-pi-ye no malaokay a niyado'an, malokay ko loma'. ci nida o Se-lea-se tademaw " caay kaw Se-la-ho tademaw, dayhan Sa-pa-ti-yo-se o Se-lea-se a nganganan". tada kamo nida o La-tin-yi, hakiya oyni ko sakanamohan nida a Ti-koo notipanay a kawaw. ci Ca-se-tin-ni naw Ca-se-tin yise a iloc, Ca-se-tin o hitay ci nida, kapah ko kawaw nida sisa patapabaw han malatahodan, alaw malahongti. . Ca-se-tin yise sapadekan nida ci Ca-se-tin malawawa kapah ko nipahabay malamilaylayay a tademaw, imahin ci Ca-li-se itini i ti-koo cen-ce o tahodan to ci nida. kapatayan ni Ca-se-tin yise, patideng han ci nida malaHon-ti, pacopiyaway ko acawa nida, bangcalay a Di-aw-doo-la, nai' ko wawa tatosa. . limnemlim mihca caycay bolad caysip demiad Ca-se-tin-ni itida i Con-se-tan-tin-paw mapatay. 565年11月14 . sakay hekal a kawaw外政 Ca-se-tin yise nganganan nida a kawaw sakay hekal sapidodoc to Loo-ma a nipatideng to kiliseto no sikoan a kanatal. likisi syecia misoayaw tina kainian ninakawawan idaw ko wenday. idaw ko sananay ci Ca-se-tin yisean to tenes a nikiyakoan tina kawawan, nika idaw ko sananay tina kawawan o lima a lasobo tolo a bataan idaw ko sepat mihcaan o tahodan no hitay nida ci Pei-li-sa-liw mademec ko Wan-ta tademaw sisa malakawaw nida sa. Ca-se-tin yise sadikoday nida o La-ti-yi ko kamo nida a Ton-loo-ma hongti, pabalohay midebong to Ko-loo-ma kanatal a ahebalay no lala'an. Po-loo-ke-se-e'-se itida i likisi a codadan nida to " malepacaw" idaw ko nipikilokan to ci Ca-se-tin yise a nikalepacawan. . nidadoyan a nakamoan評價 nikaydaan a likisi ni kinkiwan ci Ca-se-tin yise a nipikowan no zitayan mahida o Si-la-loo-ma zitay nikodanay a kapahay no zitayan, ayda a nikinkiwan toyni a kawawan idaw ko mahicaay kiya a kamoan. misoayaw to nipatideng nida to kanatalan katokoh ayda idaw henay ko cinglaw. ci Ca-se-tin yise hatidaay to no tenes a malpacaw yadah ko malawpesay no Tong-loo-ma kanatal, tadayadah ko nikalawpesay no Tong-loo-ma a kalisiwan. amica ko nikahida, hedek sa mikowa to Tong-loo-ma kanatal nai' ko nipabaliwan o Ti-con-hay lilis a icelangan, nika oyni a nikaicelangan no kawawan tada talakawto ko nipacobelis. amica ci Ca-se-tin yise a sakay hekal a kawawan, sakay labo no kawawan kacilicili han. micidek ko tawyaay a tademaw ni Ca-se-tin yise pihacen ko nipicilian ci nidaan. micidek ci Po-loo-ke-pi-e-se itida i "mi-se" misoayaw ci Ca-se-tin yise patahekal to picidekan a nipicilian. aydaay a lise-syecia to sakacinlawan no kitidaan ci Ca-se-tin yise a cen-ce' ato ayawan nida a tademaw ci Ca-se-tin yise no kawawan tatengan idaw ko tabakiay no laadan, ato Ca-se-tin-ni yise a kawaw tatengan haw sakalihalay a nisimsiman o linzi a nipatocekan. . kasilahecian 總結 katokoh to ayda ci Ca-se-tin-ni yise pala o somamaday maotangay no cacay a min-con. nai' ko sapabaliw ci nidaan ato Tay-ke'-li since ato Con-se-tan-tin ta-di' sakalecad o Ko-loo-ma tikoo maotangay no sakaetiman a hong-tian. malamilaliday to batad, pikowanan no matenesay a Hong-ti amisoayaw to sapikawaw to polong no kawawan caay kaw madayonmay. sipakayda i yadhay a mosakamo ci Ca-se-tin-ni yise itida i O-coo likisian no sipakayda pasayda i congseci a milakooday, sitongosay no angangan a tademaw. . Ca-se-tin-ni yise malangato mikawaw henay to kanatal a picidekan no angangan o Loo-ma henay a waywayan, kapatayan ni Ca-se-tin-ni-yise malaSi-la to ko wayway. palawpesen nida ko Ko-loo-ma a koo-min cocon, Hong-ti mala con-cin nipabeli no di'to a kanatal co-con. nika tawya o Hong-ti mangalay henay to hitay a nipacokel ato doyi. itida i Fa-sye ato Sen-sye ci Ca-se-tin-ni yese a sapaayaw no nikodanay a sapalahat idaw ko picidekan a malalid. sakay hekal nida a sapalekal to kanatal a kawaw patideng itida caay kaw tanektekay, ci Ca-se-tin-ni yise caay kaw matenesay a mapatay mahicaay to kiya ko niyado'. walian no lilisan ci Ca-se-tin-ni yise yo maodip henay kanatal namangalay to sakaoip malingato to miedis. . ci Ca-se-tin-ni yise malingato patideng to kanatal a kiyako o sadikoday a mapalekal hanipisepi han ko Loo-ma kanatala, nika caay kaw kapahay a tahodan, pikowanan nida ba'ket ko dadimata'an no tademaw, itida i kiwkiwkayan caay pisodang, amica ko nika hida nida ka caay pisodan caay to kalaheci ko sapitonyi to kanatal a mokti.
